titleStmt.title: The saints treasury being sundry sermons preached in London / by the late reverend and painfull minister of the gospel, Jeremiah Burroughes.
titleStmt.author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. for John Wright,

notesStmt.note: "Holding forth 1. The incomparable excellency and holinesse of God. 2. Christs all in all. 3. The glorious enjoyment of heavenly things by faith. 4. The naturall mans bondage to the law and the Christians liberty by the gospell. 5. A preparation for judgement."
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
